DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine investigational drug effective safe child perennial allergic rhinitis .
DOC.brief_title: Perennial Allergic Rhinitis Study In Pediatric Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Parallel-Group , Multicenter Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Once-Daily , Intranasal Administration GW685698X Aqueous Nasal Spray 50mcg 100mcg 12 Weeks Pediatric Subjects Ages 2 < 12 Years Perennial Allergic Rhinitis ( PAR )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis perennial allergic rhinitis . Exclusion criterion : Have significant concomitant medical condition . Use corticosteroid allergy medication study . Have abnormal ECG . Have laboratory abnormality . Have abnormal eye exam .
